notes.title: Update `start` Script to use parcel
notes.details: start script had to be updated from  from: "scripts": { "build": "webpack -p", "start": "webpack-dev-server ./webpack.config.js --content-base ./public" to "scripts": { "start": "parcel src/index.html --open"

notes.title: Fancy import
notes.details: Changed the import statement in "Lesson 05/use" to be "import { Fancy } from 'fancy';"

notes.title: Update Script
notes.details: start script had to be updated from  from: "scripts": { "build": "webpack -p", "start": "webpack-dev-server ./webpack.config.js --content-base ./public" to "scripts": { "build": "webpack -p", "start": "webpack-dev-server -d --content-base ./public"
